text:
@realDonaldTrump @narendramodi Don't be so stupid Uncle Trump,
#Narendermodi said #India is #atmanirbharbharat so better stay away & u should think of the #USA 
#India will never ask for anything from anyone anymore.
We'll die reaching our homes.

We'll some day create our own #Twitter 

#COVID19 #coronavirus
